title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, October 22, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Doris Lessing (1919-2013), who said, “A writer falls in love with an idea and gets carried away…It's one of the great pleasures in my life."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Doris Lessing (1919-2013), who said, “A writer falls in love with an idea and gets carried away…It's one of the great pleasures in my life."
